unnormalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment! Did your WiFi throw a tantrum during checkout, like my grandma's Airtel connection on 26/01/2024? Don't worry, we've all been there! Maybe the final price looked like Ambani's net worth. Come back, Priya! That saree from Jaipur at 14:00 hrs is calling your name. We'll even throw in free shipping, valid till 10/10/2024, just like the Diwali sale promised!
normalised: Oh ho, cart abandonment! Did your Wi-Fi throw a tantrum during checkout, like my grandma's Airtel connection on twenty six january two thousand and twenty four? Don't worry, we've all been there! Maybe the final price looked like Ambani's net worth. Come back, Priya! That saree from Jaipur at two in the afternoon hours is calling your name. We'll even throw in free shipping, valid till tenth october two thousand and twenty four, just like the Diwali sale promised!
